text: Took my delivery order, charged my card and then didn’t deliver my pizza at all. I understand it was close to closing (I ordered at 920pm, said pizza would be delivered by 945p; they close at 10p). But there wasn’t even a call to say they weren’t coming and no one picked up when I called at 950p. Super unsatisfied with this service.

text: There were 2 tables, 1 being me. The server Elsie, only came by to bring our drinks and food. They didn't have any salads, and were unable to serve a beer due to no one having a server's license. I ordered a personal pan pizza to go and had to wait 30 min for it.
